General.Name: Deltamac Taiwan Co Ltd
General.Description: Deltamac(Taiwan)Co.,Ltd produces, distributes, and franchises audio and video products in Taiwan. The company engages in the production, recording, publication, rental, distribution, and export and import of rights. It is also involved in the agency and sale of physical and digital copyrights of movies; operation of TSUTAYA bookstores and Wired Tokyo cafés; and provision of catering services. In addition, the company sells stationery products. Deltamac(Taiwan)Co.,Ltd was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 53, Minquan West Road, Taipei, Taiwan
